thread.title: Donna Martin
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Donna Martin

author: Donna Martin
title: Donna Martin
text: I searched everywhere for a replacement chimney for one I had broken. I went to Antique Lamp Supply on a whim. Much to my surprise, they have the greatest selection. I was able to find exactly what I needed. I have two lamps I use together. This chimney matched perfectly. I ordered two in case there was a difference, so now I have a extra one. I am so happy I found this site. In addition to having what I needed, the prices are very good and the order was received quickly. I only had to wait three days to get my replacement.
